The hot keys using Ctrl + Letter are not working for me. What funny is the Alt + (Displayed Key) is.

Not sure yet what the problem is. Please help.

There is no automatic handling of Ctrl + (Letter) in the Windows Ribbon Framework.
You must handle this key press yourself.

The only automatic access keys are Alt + (Displayed Letter), which you already find out yourself.

KeyUp Event for anyone else that need it. Still wish I could foreach the ribbon to get all the RibbonButtons and Invoke the event.
        public void Editor_KeyUp(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)
        {
            if (e.Control)
            {
                switch (e.KeyCode)
                {
                    case Keys.N:
                        mnuNewProject_Click(null, null);
                        break;
                }
            }
        }
